Se_Star_Yubar_D_BonusDamageToLight.rawDesc: Increases all damage dealt to enemies with 5 or more stacks of <color=yellow>Light</color> by {0}.

Se_Star_Yubar_D_ConvertADToAP.rawDesc: Gain <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> equal to {0} of your <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color>.

Se_Star_Yubar_F_CC_IncreaseAD.lore: He seems slightly irritated by mortals who keep confusing his gender.

Se_Star_Yubar_F_CC_IncreaseAD.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Cataclysm</color> increases Yubar's Attack Damage instead of Ability Power.

Se_Star_Yubar_F_EI_NoRootMoreDamage.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Ether's Influence</color> no longer roots enemies but its explosion damage is increased by {0}.

Se_Star_Yubar_F_TQ_EssenceCooldown.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Tranquility</color>'s cooldown is increased by {0} seconds, but it also reduces the cooldowns of all essences.
